title: Broun Facepak for Android wear
summary: Watch face for the Moto360, LG G Watch R or any round face**READ. DESCRIPTION.
description: **********THIS APP NEEDS THE APP "FACE", NOT "FACER" (Read below)To use, Download this, and apply the watchface through the apphttp://goo.gl/qRCR7RJoin the community too.http://goo.gl/EDGkmBIf you still have troubles, Contact meMainly a watch face for the Moto 360 (or moto360) or the LG G Watch R, or any round watch face, but I could eventually do square ones if more people request themAny changes/updates I make will be updated in the app where you can update when I publish a new version!Email me if you have any requests for a watch face
descriptionHTML:
**********THIS APP NEEDS THE APP "FACE", NOT "FACER" (Read below)

To use, Download this, and apply the watchface through the app
http://goo.gl/qRCR7R
Join the community too.
http://goo.gl/EDGkmB
If you still have troubles, Contact me

Mainly a watch face for the Moto 360 (or moto360) or the LG G Watch R, or any round watch face, but I could eventually do square ones if more people request them

Any changes/updates I make will be updated in the app where you can update when I publish a new version!

Email me if you have any requests for a watch face
comments: Does not show up on lg g watch r Don't trust this after seeing loads of paid for ratings with 5 stars and no comments ... un installing now
